entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:32 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
